now?

N-No. I couldn't let you do that for me.

Hehe, but you can rely on me in times like

Okay, fine. I guess I could take you up on

Yes. A night walk would do us good.

So just because you're good, you think
everything's fine?

Ugh!

Why are you going around like that without
telling me? What would I do if something

S-Sorry... I-I didn't mean to worry you.

through right now?! You don't even have powers!
How many times have I told you?!

immediately, but...

until we get some results.
Right...

I hope you'll make some progress, then. Leave
the situation to us. Shido, you just continue
looking after the Spirits.
Right. Got it.

Also, you've been spending too much time
with Kurumi recently. I know you know, but
she's dangerous. Just keep your guard up.
I'll remember that.

(But...seeing Kurumi, I can't help but worry
about her. There's something there, I'm sure.)
